Class CommonUtils

java.lang.Object
com.zs.utils.CommonUtils
public class CommonUtils extends Object
Utility class containing common methods used across different test scenarios. Provides helper methods for locator retrieval, app-specific actions, and navigation.

    • isTextPresent

      public boolean isTextPresent(String text)
      Checks if text is present on the current screen
      Parameters:
      text - The text to search for.
      Returns:
      true if text is present, false otherwise.

    • getProfileLocator

      public static org.openqa.selenium.By getProfileLocator(String appName, String key)
      Fetches a profile locator based on app's name and key
      Parameters:
      appName - name of the application whose locator needs to be retrieved
      key - key of that locator in hashmap
      Returns:
      locator for the specified key
